channel.title: Client Help
channel.description: I have successfully got my server running but one problem is that the only way to open to client is a .bat and I'm on a Macintosh laptop and Mac's cannot run .bat. Any Idea's? Maybe you guys can send me a link to a Client that can change the ip that is a .jar ? I tried making a webclient but it takes forever for it to load and when I finally log in it freezes.

item.title: Client Help
item.dc:creator: @Dragon99999 Dragon99999
item.description:
@Dragon99999 wrote:

First of all, this should have been posted in the Client Help Section.

Second of all, you can make a .jar with all of your client classes, and then run the JAR file.
But the only way I know how to do that is through the command prompt, sorry.

Read full topic

item.title: Client Help
item.dc:creator: @Ttwiitter Ttwiitter
item.description:
@Ttwiitter wrote:

I have successfully got my server running but one problem is that the only way to open to client is a .bat and I’m on a Macintosh laptop and Mac’s cannot run .bat. Any Idea’s? Maybe you guys can send me a link to a Client that can change the ip that is a .jar ? I tried making a webclient but it takes forever for it to load and when I finally log in it freezes.

Read full topic
